UniprotID	Q02080-2
Accession	Q02080;A0AV80;B4DVH7;B7ZVY1;G5E9M1
EntryName	MEF2B_HUMAN
ProteinName	Myocyte-specific enhancer factor 2B (RSRFR2) (Serum response factor-like protein 2)
GeneName	MEF2B XMEF2
Length	368
Function	Transcriptional activator which binds specifically to the MEF2 element, 5'-YTA(4)TAR-3', found in numerous muscle-specific genes. Activates transcription via this element. May be involved in muscle-specific and/or growth factor-related transcription.
